about.title: About me
about.me: Web Developer with more than three years of experience in Full Stack with JavaScript / ReactJS / VueJS / NodeJS / MongoDB, constantly learning programming skills and professional growth.

resume.title: Resume
resume.red: Red ribbon in architecture design to create Web applications
resume.black: Black ribbon in architecture design to create Web applications
resume.seoDescription: WEB positioning, Web Development, Review and correction of metadata.
resume.raccoon: Development and support of multiple websites and e-commerce platforms. Successfully integrated AWS cloud services to fulfill application needs like: Sending notifications and emails with SNS, SES. Management and administration of EC2 servers. Use of S3 for resources administration. Route 53, Domain Name System (DNS). A CI/CD pipeline was implemented using Bitbucket Pipelines to automate the build and deployment of applications. Built-in Slack notifications to receive alerts on the status of the implementation and any issues that may arise.
resume.freelanceDescription: I collaborated in the development of a site for extreme sports using: NestJS, ReactJS, NextJS, multilingual support using i18n, use of multiple currencies to display depending on the country. Personal site development using: ReactJS, NextJS, Tailwind CSS, multilingual support with i18n.
